content.p: This category contains the University's regulations, policies and guidance for its research degree programmes. These pages are applicable to staff and research students across all of the UK, China and Malaysia campuses. Research degree policies and guidance Progression Supervision Assessment Research programme regulations Regulations for programmes which are not currently running Student Services Graduate School - PGR GS-PGR@nottingham.edu.cn student_registry@nottingham.edu.my Quality-Manual-Enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk Portland Building, University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
